de.team33.libs.reflect.v4

Class FieldMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.team33.libs.reflect.v4.FieldMapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of interest

    public final class FieldMapper<T>
extends Object

    A tool that can copy instances of a certain type field by field or translate them into or from a map.

    To get an instance use factory(Function) or FACTORY and FieldMapper.Factory.mapperFor(Class).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FieldMapper.Factory
      Abstracts a factory for FieldMapper instances.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FieldMapper.Factory FACTORY
      A default FieldMapper.Factory to get typical FieldMapper instances that take into account all non-transient instance fields of a given class and its superclasses (if any).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T copy(T origin, T target)
      Copies the fields of an original instance of the underlying type into a corresponding target instance.
      static FieldMapper.Factory factory(Function<Class<?>,Map<String,Field>> mapping)
      A method to get a FieldMapper.Factory that differs from the default factory.
      T map(Map<?,?> origin, T target)
      Copies the values of an original map into a corresponding target instance of the underlying type.
      <M extends Map<String,Object>>
      M      		 map(T origin, M target)
      Copies the fields of a source instance of the underlying type to a target map, which must be a mutable map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
